scripts.dev: node ace serve --watch && node ace scheduler:run
scripts.dev:hard: node ace migration:refresh --force;node ace db:seed;node ace serve --watch;
scripts.build: node ace build --production --ignore-ts-errors && npm run copy:html
scripts.build:prod: npm install &&  npm run build && cp .env build/  &&  node build/ace migration:run --force && node build/ace db:seed
scripts.pm2:prod: cp .env ./build & pm2 start npm --name 'offramp-server' -- run start:prod && pm2 start npm --name 'offramp-rates-scheduler' -- run rates:scheduler && pm2 logs offramp-server
scripts.pm2:dev: cp .env ./build & pm2 start npm --name 'offramp-server-dev' -- run start:prod && pm2 logs offramp-server-dev
